attributes.action: Jacqui Stych - Chair/Sec/Event Organiser of Britannia Community Action Group
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oppose Dominion Property Developers to build shared ownership housing on existing resident car parking spaces and take away 36 garages and 72 car parking spaces. The streets are full of parked cars and have restricted times of parking due to either single or double yellow lines. Also it is a built up area of many flats with little community space.

rejection.details: Can you incorporate the point of your petition into the title?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
